explanation:
<think>
At [0-1], a man is lying on a bed, and a left hand is holding a white plate under his head while a right hand combs his hair. This suggests that the white plate is being used to catch something falling from his hair, likely sesame seeds. Since this is the first segment and there is no prior context indicating the plate was used before, it seems the white plate is used at least once. The dense caption confirms the action of holding the plate under the man's head, aligning with the visual observation. There is no indication of the plate being used more than once in this segment, so options suggesting multiple uses (A, B, D) are not supported yet. Option C ("The white plate is used once in the video.") is the most consistent with the current evidence.
</think>

The dense caption also mentions the use of the comb to pick up sesame seeds from the man's hair, aligning with the visual evidence of the plate being used again.
